entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 9 Preview 6 #316
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-30105 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #315
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-35264 | .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #314
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-38081 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #313
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-38095 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #312
  • .NET July 2024 Updates #311

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [6.0] Test failure in System.Formats.Asn1 ReadVeryLongOid_WithAppContext: could not load file or assembly in NET48 #104647
  • [API Proposal]: X509FindType.FindByThumbprintSha256 #104643
  • Automate parts of the PackageOverrides.txt #104639
  • JIT: Consider making handles their own node type #104636
    10.0.0
  • classloader/StaticVirtualMethods/GenericContext/GenericContextTest takes very long under GC stress, times out on OSX-arm64 #104633
  • Access violation while finding shadow stack pointer in nativeaot/SmokeTests/UnitTests #104628
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-38095 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #104622
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-38081 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #104621
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-30105 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #104619
  • [browser] tests and fixes for heap larger than 2GB #104618
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.ClientModel service method collection return types #104617
  • JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull appears to be ignored when deserializing data #104614
    Future
  • [libraries-jitstress] `System.Tests.UInt128Tests_GenericMath.TryReadLittleEndianUInt64Test` fails in CI #104613
    9.0.0
  • In .NET 9 preview 5 blazor WASM with chromium browsers, when using request streaming, `HttpRequestException` is thrown unexpectedly if a response is sent before the stream is fully sent to the server #104612
  • System.Diagnostics - API surface confusion for TagList / ActivityTagsCollection #104607
    Future
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamNetworkStreamTest.SslStream_RandomSizeWrites_OK #104605
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `IpNetwork` does not allow to check if another network is subnet of current network #104591
    Future
  • Remove `DomainAssembly` concept #104590
  • [outerloop] System.Runtime.Numerics.Tests crash with exit code 137 in linux debug coreclr #104588
  • .NET 8 fails to load System.Security.Permissions when dynamically loading plugin that references Framework #104587
  • [outerloop] `System.Numerics.Tests.ToStringTest.ToString_ValidLargeFormat` faling with `OutOfMemoryException` #104586
  • JIT doesn't allow method prologues to have more than one instruction group #104585
  • asmdiff failed for checked and release for smoke_tests.nativeaot.windows.arm64 #104584
    9.0.0
  • Exception thrown in GC callback while walking native object wrappers on AOT #104582

Closed

  • Customize bundle extract base directory within the app #104422
  • [API Proposal]: Expose polymorphic base type in `JsonSchemaExporterContext` #104046
    9.0.0
  • NullReferenceException when you use the short format of string.format $"{sample}" when debugging .NET 7 on x64 macOS #78991
    9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] `ToFrozenSet` crashes on iOS devices with `8.0.3` release #101427
    8.0.x
  • [WASM] When AOT is used it throws Arg_InvalidCastException #100527
    9.0.0
  • Native Crash occurs when using Generics Types #103569
    9.0.0
  • System.NullReferenceException in System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager #104592
  • [browser][MT] Deadlock in TCValidateAfterAddInvalidSchema.AddValid_Import_Include_Redefine #99499
    9.0.0
  • DateTime.MinValue.ToUniversalTime incorrect time #104604
  • JIT: Handle liveness for defined retbufs in physical promotion #86711
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] HttpClient test failure - attempting to access disposed object 'ConnectedStreams' #96797
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-30045 | .NET Remote code Execution Vulnerability #102206
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-21392: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #99621
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-26190 | Microsoft QUIC Denial of Service Vulnerability #99620
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-21404 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #98373
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-0057: .NET Security Feature bypass Vulnerability #96700
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36558: .NET Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability #94726
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36049: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #94725
  • Can't build for arm on an arm64 windows box #81493
    Future
  • [runtime-extra-platforms] tvos arm64 mono net.dot.JIT_Directed application failing with DllNotFoundException: EmptyStructsLib #104348
  • [API Proposal]: Diagnostic method information #96528
    9.0.0
  • what's different between use and not use await base.OnAfterRenderAsync #96953
  • HttpClient on Android sends wrong content-type header with ByteArrayContent #102923
    9.0.0
  • does coreclr support ios platform? #100055
  • Unable to resolve symbols when additional metadata references are added to the project compilation #104127
  • <WasiAfterRuntimeLoaded> is broken in wasi-wasm workflow #92551
    9.0.0
  • Compilation in Windows Container fails #104146
  • [Question] How .Net application with dependencies works in Arm64 runtime/environment? #100432
  • Blazor Hybird Release Buid error-target andriod #102276
  • [API Proposal]: Consider adding methods to the HTTP Client factory that receive Type parameters instead of generic type parameters #104525
  • [NativeAOT] Inline access to thread statics #79521
    9.0.0
  • AuthenticateAsClientAsync can fail if renegotiation is requested immediately after handshake #91409
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce isolation in AssemblyLoadContext #103878
  • docker build --rm -f test.dockerfile . -t img-test : native aot compilation fails on Mac M1 in version 9, ok in version 8 #104325
  • iOS AllSubsets_Mono queues can take a very long time #100752
    9.0.0
  • [Ubuntu 22.10] error: definition of builtin function '__cpuid' when using clang-15: could the fix be backported to 6.0.1XX? #76882

PullRequests

Created

  • ARM64-SVE: Add `FloatingPointExponentialAccelerator` #104649
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Add NET 8.0 target to Microsoft.Bcl.Memory package #104648
    needs-area-label
  • Do more DSA parameter sanity checking up front #104646
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Limit the size of OID supported by AsnDecoder/AsnReader #104645
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, 9.0.0
  • Throw InvalidOperationException on RuntimeMethodHandle.GetFunctionPointer() for generic methods #104644
    area-System.Reflection, 9.0.0
  • Use GetTempPath2 on Windows if available #104642
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Enable DiagnosticsTest for HTTP3 #104641
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `AddSequentialAcross` #104640
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Update PackageOverrides.txt #104638
    area-Setup
  • [NO REVIEW] Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add a fallback to filling buffers in DeserializeAsyncEnumerable. #104635
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Skip switch recognition for handles #104634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WASI] p2 baseline #104632
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Add bucket bound hints to Networking histograms #104629
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Fix various asserts that were found by Antigen #104625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Disallow implicit byref args and return buffers from aliasing #104616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] troubleshooting deadlocks 2 #104615
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Support copying arrays of compatible pointers #104611
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Optimize Guid comparisons #104610
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Update SYSLIB0026 with new message #104609
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Remove unused string parameter from mono_wasm_load_runtime #104608
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [NOREVIEW] System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamNetworkStreamTest.SslStream_RandomSizeWrites_OK investigation PR #104606
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Straighten out flow during early jump threading #104603
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add `JsonMarshal.GetRawUtf8Value` #104595
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Account for mixed-enregistered locals when zeroing without block-init #104593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DivRem with DivisionRounding (WIP + Review request) #104589
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fixes hang in WinUI apps published to AOT #104583
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #104623
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #104624
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface2::GetObjectExceptionData #104343
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [8.0] Add a config flag to experiment with some work item prioritization changes in cases involving a lot of sync-over-async #103984
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 8.0.8
  • Add a config flag to experiment with some work item prioritization changes in cases involving a lot of sync-over-async #103983
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Add JsonSchemaExporterContext.BaseTypeInfo #104550
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Check for `IDispatch` properly #104406
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyExcept in BigInteger.IsPowerOfTwo #104513
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for `Int128` ↔`UInt128` operators #104506
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Start Loader contract and implement ISOSDacInterface::GetModuleData in cDAC #104257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Synchronized description of destinationDirectoryName parameter #100330
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Dispose XmlReader in SchemaExporter when done #103286
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Switch uses of `DomainAssembly` that just need `Assembly` to use `Assembly` #104334
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle retbuf definitions precisely in physical promotion's liveness #104551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] troubleshooting deadlocks #104539
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix mono_wasm_load_runtime cwrap signature #104356
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove .gdnbaselines file #104594
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update solution files to include all CoreLib dependencies #104561
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasi] Fix `ItemGroup` concatenation in wasi #104549
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [browser] host should not forward env variables #104557
    arch-wasm, area-Host, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Support retbuf optimization for non 'lvIsTemp' locals #104467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [android] Don't include `JNI_OnLoad` in `libSystem.Security.Cryptography.Native.Android.a` #103231
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Get ThreadContext for AVX registers #104514
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Fix handling SECBUFFER_EXTRA with renegotiation after handshake. #103419
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Remove unused test server deployment scripts #104553
    area-System.Net
  • [QUIC] Fixed some tests leaking unobserved exceptions #104444
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Arm64/Sve: Fix GatherPrefetch and Prefetch APIs #104494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Fix syntax of exports file with no exported symbols on Linux #104339
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • CodeQL spillStack #104376
    area-VM-coreclr
  • updating mono reflection area path ownership #104568
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Activities for Http Connections, Dns, Sockets and SslStream #103922
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2491669 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge 1ES templates #103366
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add standard tags to HttpClient native trace instrumentation #104251
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #104395
    needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #104565
    needs-area-label
  • Remove class constraint from Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange #104558
    area-System.Threading
  • [RISC-V] JIT: pass structs according to floating-point calling convention properly #104237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Coy prop equivalent phis #104458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASIp2 + wasi:http #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [mono] Skip exact interface matches when an interface has variance #103757
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • (WIP) Arm64/SVE: Implemented `AddRotateComplex` and `AddSequentialAcross` #104258
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Enhancing the SqlDbType with Json #103985
    area-System.Data
  • Expose `JsonElement.DeepEquals` #104579
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add the new Lock type to Concurrent Dicionary #104575
    area-System.Collections
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift struct lowering in direct P/Invoke returns #104389
    arch-arm64, arch-x64, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono][metadata] Fixes for static virtual methods with interface variance #91664
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix cancelability of DNS queries #104420
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix an issue with complex number parsing #104499
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 8.0.8
  • Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [LibraryImportGenerator] Use basic forwarder in down-level support if any parameters can't be marshalled #104501
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.8
  • Add support for Sve.Scatter() #104555
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [wasi] sdk22 path #104379
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Qemu #104094
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • add new JsonIgnoreAttribute WhenWriting/WhenReading #104562
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `ConvertToSingle`, `ConvertToDouble`; fix `CovertTo*` tests #104478
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Console.Unix: revert SetWindowSize implementation. #100272
    area-System.Console, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Improve performance of interface method resolution in ILC #103066
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [Mono] [swift-interop] Add support for reverse pinvoke argument lowering #104437
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Trim XmlSerializers codegen if unsupported #88796
    area-Serialization, linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Implement `Console.Beep` via bell character instead of Windows API #102685
    area-System.Console, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Handle possible null in SerialStream.Dispose() on Windows #103671
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add SYSLIB0056 to list of diagnostics #104005
    needs-area-label
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove `CallArg::m_tmpNum` #104429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Error out when the size of a field is too big #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Ignore type resolution failures when checking for attributes in `StackTrace.ToString`. #104530
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Link native shared libraries with 16k page alignment #104577
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Add support for `SwiftSelf<T>` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104171
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Enable TLS on linux/arm64 only for static resolver #104408
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Only build applicable build Tasks when building the repo #104226
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make it possible to trim custom attribute artifacts #100395
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adds `SpanSplitEnumerator` #104534
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix SortedSet.InternalIndexOf 102118 #102249
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Proposed fix for issue XSLT extension methods format-date & format-time #97402
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [Apple-Mobile][Globalization] Refactoring of CalendarData.iOS and new DateTimeFormatInfo* tests #102464
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • Windows CNG virtualization-based security #102495
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement `Assembly.GetCallingAssembly` for native AOT #104229
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid scanning typeof checks when building whole program view #103883
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Define _REENTRANT for SUNOS #104527
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Decompose some bitwise operations in HIR to allow more overall optimizations to kick in #104517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't call fcntl on an invalid file descriptor. #104535
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Have mono handle the vector as APIs that grow or shrink the vector type #104445
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Support dotnet.js #2434

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Move 8.0.4xx to internal #42055
  • Setting <IsPublishable>false</IsPublishable> should force PublishIISAssets to false. #42048
  • Intermittent test project build failures #42045

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E] With Net9 preview 6 installed, running `dotnet razor.dll' failed after opening http://localhost:5000 via browser. #41776
  • [NETSDKE2E]With net9 preview 7 sdk installed, Running winforms/wpf failed in CLI. #42012
  • Ambiguous dotnet tool --global error message #26813
  • string.Compare(InvariantCulture) returns different result as .Net Framework #42014

PullRequests

Created

  • NuGet patch to fix obsolete warnings #42057
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42056
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to the 8.0.7 July release #42054
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • stabilize branding for release #42053
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit versions for July #42052
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Disable templating tests on windows to unblock PR builds" #42051
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #42049
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WinForms trim value default tests #42034
    Area-ILLink

Merged

  • Adding SignalR CustomAwaitable feature switch #41832
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Workload VM test improvements #42021
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #41969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #42046
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #42037
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Obtain internal runtime SAS tokens via federated creds #41797
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • JsonPropertyPostAction: allow to create file and path #41959
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • DefaultRuntimeHostConfigurationOptions for WinForms trimming #41702
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Remove RIDS in CompareMsftToSbAssemblyVersions test #42022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use PackageDownload in torn builds #41951
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add RazorLangVersion 9 #40348
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2491675 #41887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Moved src/Assets to test/TestAssets #41924
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Permit loose manifest priority #41996
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Workload History (part 4) #42020
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Ensure all template code files have UTF-8 BOM #41376
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Add certificate content type checking to Signature.cs #42025
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Testing sbrp changes #42028
    DO NOT MERGE
  • Allow for GenAPI to include additional API #38232
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-09
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Object initializer updates #8253

Updated

  • Propose relaxed ordering for partial and ref modifiers #8134
  • Extract open issues and organize Expressions section #8209

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assert failure in AnalyzerDriver #74315
    17.12
  • Building twice in VS is broken. #74314
  • A delegate type synthesized by compiler can refer to an inaccessible type #74312
    Backlog
  • Wrong type with Concat and litteral collection [] #74309
  • Add SymbolDisplayFormat parameter to TypedConstant.ToCSharpString/ToVisualBasicString #74304
  • Change bootstrap framework CI leg to be consistent with SDK #74303
  • Hitting Debug.Assert in the compiler (TypeWithAnnotations.cs) #74297
    17.12

Closed

  • Syntax_Provider_Doesnt_Attribute_Incorrect_Timing flaky on MacOS #61474
    17.4

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Properties for a class that extends Dictionary are not present in the JSON schema #56707

Closed

  • Fix template tests to run in CI #46430
    9.0-preview7

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #56682
  • Perf regression: plaintext #56650
  • Perf regression: endpoint, single_query #56681
  • Schema get duplicated for every request in open-api #56541
    9.0-preview7
  • System.Text.Json Wrong serialization after Newtonsoft migration #56686
  • Problem With some extensions like tronlink #56512
  • Add CreateNamedPipeServerStream to named pipes options #56568

Created

Merged

  • Add CreateNamedPipeServerStream to named pipes options #56567
    area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.7.24358.2 #56667

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Bump to macos-12 build image #56273
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • Add support for trusting dev certs on linux #56582
    area-networking

    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support for a Single Project with Multiple Provider Migrations - Edge Case/Issue/Request #34197
  • Allow to configure Migrate lock timeout #34196
    Backlog
  • Cosmos: Use ReadItem when a concrete discriminator is manually specified in the predicate #34195
    Backlog
  • Cosmos: Warn when the partition key is given via both WithPartitionKey() and the predicate #34194
    Backlog
  • Split mappings are not supported for hierarchies #34190

Closed

  • Cosmos: We incorrectly execute via ReadItem, ignoring additional operators composed on top #34085
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: Extra clauses are removed from the query when extracting hierarchical partition key values #33960
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: Optimize more queries that could use ReadItem #20693
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: Detect partition key filters in more queries #20350
    9.0.0
  • AOT/Compiled model: Somewhat complex entity with enums produces compiled model that contains AOT warnings #34057
    9.0.0
  • Generate fully qualified lambda signatures for better compilation speed #33773
    9.0.0
  • Generate shorter UnsafeAccessor names #33470
    9.0.0
  • Auto Aliasing is reusing same alias for two different tables causing a value comparison to return the wrong value. #34193
  • Improve performance for RelationalCommandCache by adding a hashcode to the Command #34117
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Use XOR to translate more == and != expressions #34168
  • Cosmos: Redo ReadItem and partition key management #34187
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #34192
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #34191
  • Add UnsafeAccessor support for generic types #34146
  • Fix for #34117, Improve Hash Code Distribution for RelationalCommandCache Keys #34118

Updated

  • Use null propagation to optimize away `IS NOT NULL` checks #34127
  • Implement `CASE` flattening optimizations #34175
  • Prefer equality in boolean comparisons #34166
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #34144
  • Lock the database while executing Migrate() #34115
    providers-beware
